description: For the rest of the game, all of your Elemental spells and <link=keyword.Elemental Skill><sprite name=ElementalSkill><style=Keyword>Skills</style></link> deal 1 extra damage.
descriptionRaw: For the rest of the game, all of your Elemental spells and Skills deal 1 extra damage.
flavorText: "In the hands of the wise, water shapes all." - Dedicant of Wisdom
name: Deluge

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Manifest><style=Vocab>Manifest</style></link> two different Elemental spells you've played this game. They cost 0 this round.
descriptionRaw: Play: Manifest two different Elemental spells you've played this game. They cost 0 this round.
flavorText: "The mind is a river. Over time, the dedication of its flow carves the faces of the mountains. And like the mind, with momentum, it may grow ever wider and touch new shores."
name: Wizened Helmsman

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Slipstream</style></link> in the top 6 cards of your deck.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Slipstream in the top 6 cards of your deck.
flavorText: "Look, my friends, at how the whole world moves with us! The waves dance beneath the hull, the wind in the sails, the birds upon the breeze. Join me in our highest calling, and rejoice!"
name: Vikrash the Exuberant

description: Deal 2 damage to a unit. It can't drop below 1 Health from this damage.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 damage to a unit. It can't drop below 1 Health from this damage.
flavorText: "Monsters who call themselves gods have a long way to fall, no matter the land." - Nilah
name: Formless Blade

description: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus, increased by 1 for each other <link=card.selfref><style=AssociatedCard>Wildfire</style></link> you've played. Create a <link=card.selfref><style=AssociatedCard>Wildfire</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus, increased by 1 for each other Wildfire you've played. Create a Wildfire in your deck.
name: Wildfire

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Slipstream</style></link> in the top 6 cards of your deck.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Create a Slipstream in the top 6 cards of your deck.
flavorText: In the north, a new challenger awaits Nilah and her monster-hunting crew: a creature called the Volibear, who threatens to destroy the Freljord that once worshipped him. For Nilah, the chance to test her skills against a monster others call a god is the opportunity of a lifetime. Not to mention the lesser monstrosities she will add to her list of accomplishments along the way.
name: Nilah

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Slipstream</style></link> in the top 6 cards of your deck and deal 2 damage to all enemies and the enemy Nexus. They cannot drop below 1 Health from this damage.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Create a Slipstream in the top 6 cards of your deck and deal 2 damage to all enemies and the enemy Nexus. They cannot drop below 1 Health from this damage.
flavorText: "Monster! I am called Nilah of the Seventh Layer! It is my name, not yours, which will be remembered by history."
name: Nilah

description:
Deal 2 damage to a unit. It can't drop below 1 Health from this damage.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Nilah</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 2 damage to a unit. It can't drop below 1 Health from this damage.
Create a Nilah in your deck.
name: Nilah's Formless Blade

description: Give allies +1|+0 this round and heal damaged allies 2.
descriptionRaw: Give allies +1|+0 this round and heal damaged allies 2.
name: Joy Unending

description: Once you've drawn 3+ cards in a round this game, grant me +1|+1 and <link=keyword.Brash><sprite name=Brash><style=Keyword>Brash</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Once you've drawn 3+ cards in a round this game, grant me +1|+1 and Brash.
flavorText: "Hey, bud, what's all the fuss about? Relax! There's nothing in the water we can't handle!" - Dedicant of the Challenge
name: Master Lookout

description: When I'm summoned, <link=vocab.Updraft><style=Vocab>Updraft</style></link> your hand to grant me +1|+1 for each card <link=vocab.Updraft><style=Vocab>Updrafted</style></link> and draw 2.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, Updraft your hand to grant me +1|+1 for each card Updrafted and draw 2.
flavorText: "Oh, c'mon, are you even trying? I feel like I gotta hold back, and man, I hate that!"
name: Dedicant of the Challenge

description:
When I'm summoned, draw a <link=card.champ1><style=AssociatedCard>Nilah</style></link>.
Each round, when you play your third card, give other allies +2|+0 and <link=keyword.Brash><sprite name=Brash><style=Keyword>Brash</style></link> this round. <style=Variable></style>
When I would gain <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>, reveal me instead.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, draw a Nilah.
Each round, when you play your third card, give other allies +2|+0 and Brash this round. 
When I would gain Fleeting, reveal me instead.
flavorText: "I hear that strange-shaped ship is the fastest Bilgewater's seen. Nimble, too. Got a peculiar captain, but seemed to me like she knows what she's about. Maybe we could stand to learn a thing or two." - Bilgewater bartender
name: The Tidedancer
